text: Where the Breakers Roar is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithWhere Breakers RoarRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Linda Arvidson, and Charles Inslee. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson as Tom Hudson * Linda Arvidson as Alice Fairchild * Charles Inslee as The Villain * Edward Dillon as Policeman * George Gebhardt as At the Beach / Assaulted Man * Robert Harron as On Boardwalk * Guy Hedlund * Florence Lawrence as At the Beach * Marion Leonard * Mack Sennett as Policeman * Harry Solter as At the Beach ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Where the Breakers Roar
